name: Neverwinter Nights
notes: Ignore runtime error during installation, game installed successfully and playable.

files.setup: N/A:Select the game's GOG setup file

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's GOG setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/NWN Diamond/nwn.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing game
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
